website_summaries.verdict: If you want neutral-colored, textured wallpaper, this is a good pick. Otherwise, the Blooming Wall has a bit more to offer.
pros: Beautiful raised finish that's easy to clean
Available in several neutral shades that fit most décor
cons: (But thick texture makes it easy to apply.)

customer_reviews.title: I love this wallpaper
customer_reviews.text: I love this wallpaper. It transformed our ugly purple bathroom into the room where you want to stay. I was a bit concerned that it could fall of the walls due to constant exposure to moisture, but it holds surprisingly well. Just make sure that you apply heavy-duty glue when you put it on. I bought Rust-Oleum 69384 1-Quart Suregrip 122 Heavy Duty Clear Strippable Wallpaper Adhesive and it worked really well. I bought this wallpaper in ivory (in pictures) and forest silver brown. Both shades are really beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Thunderbolt24

customer_reviews.title: Can't see a seam ANYWHERE!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful. Not as thick vinyl as I expected... it tears easily. Buy, if you're careful, it looks AMAZING when you're done. As nice as the better hotels I've stayed in. Ok, better. I found a metallic silver and gold pen set at the hobby store that blended the rips I made (my own inexperience) quite nicely. After I got rolling, it went easier. No pattern to match so that was great. Can't see a seam ANYWHERE. If it was a little more resistant to tearing, I would have given it 5 stars. All things considered, I love this paper.
customer_reviews.author: TrustMe

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty wallpaper that is easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to do a quick application of wallpaper to spruce up a very bland beige room with lots of holes in the wall. This was very easy to quickly put up with some wallpaper adhesive and is seamless so it was very easy to lay out without wrinkles or gaps. I had an irritated toddler “helping” me out I still was able to do it in about 30 minutes. If doing it by yourself it would be very easy to do a larger area without any difficulty.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Howard

customer_reviews.title: Best wallpaper I've used
customer_reviews.text: I've worked with lots of wallpaper in my life and this is among, if not top, of the best. Applying was easy, removal was easy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hides wall scares , nail holes and paneling grooves.
customer_reviews.text: Used on all my paneled walls and 11 rolls later they look great. I filled in all the panel groves with drywall mud then sanded lightly the entire wall then used dry dust mop to wipe excess mud dust. I used a heavy-duty paper paste . Very nice paper to work with but can tare easily when trimming if too much glue is used and/or not hung quick enough. The price is a little high but I forget about it when I see how good the walls look. This paper will hide a multitude of scars, nail holes and paneling grooves.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, was the first time I ever used unpasted ...
customer_reviews.text: Looks great, was the first time I ever used unpasted wallpaper but it went great. I put it in the bathroom, it's been there about a month, no problems. Would definitely use this again.
customer_reviews.author: Merri F.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, just the right amount of noticeable texture, almost like woodgrain on quality wood.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to cut and easy to install. No having to match up anything. I decided to paint it and it looks better than I thought it would. Used it to cover a bad wall in my bathroom to avoid having to rehang a new peice of drywall. Some imperfections still show but it looks too pretty to care and they really are not that noticeable with the eggshell/satin paint I used. The original color of the paper would have been fine but once I painted all the other walls, I wanted to have a more uniform color.
customer_reviews.author: A.M. Nixon

customer_reviews.title: i feel its not waterproof enough for the bathroom
customer_reviews.text: i liked the design and color of it, it pops with my bath, but i am disapointed because it dont seem to be vinyl enough, its more like paper, i am hoping it will stay up at least a few years, but i wont buy a viny paperback wallpaper anymore for the bathroom, also when you put the glue on it , it can tear easily like paper, but i was by myself, no help.
customer_reviews.author: turnaround mom

customer_reviews.title: Nice wallpaper
customer_reviews.text: This wallpaper cost more than what I wanted to spend but I felt it was a good price for the type of wallpaper. This is heavy, textured wallpaper that is NOT self-sticking. It took time to paste it and hang it correctly on the wall. A professional probably would have been able to do the same work with less difficulty. Not the type of wallpaper that an amateur should try to hang. That said, the texture and weight of the paper actually helps to hide a lot of mistakes. I would recommend this but with the suggestion that someone with experience hanging wallpaper put it up.
customer_reviews.author: michelle patton

customer_reviews.title: Great product, great service, great value.
customer_reviews.text: I love this wallpaper. I read the reviews before I bought this product and even though some said it was thin and tore easily, but I didn’t find that problem, it went on the wall perfect and had no rips. It came packaged protected and in excellent condition. I didn’t get enough to finish my bathroom with this first order so I ordered two more rolls, and they arrived yesterday in the same wonderful condition. I look forward to now finishing my bathroom. Thank you for providing a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy McCormick

customer_reviews.title: One entire wall had to be removed
customer_reviews.text: The paper itself is very nice looking. However, even after using the suggested wallpaper paste and following the included instructions, the paper did not adhere securely and required "spot" repasting. Also, soon after installation, very noticeable seams showed on one wall. After trying 3 or four different fixes for this wall's problems, all of the wallpaper had to be removed. I finally decided to paint this wall. It turned out fine, but I lost the effect that I desired. I found this paper to be disappointing and costly. Next time, I'll use a pre-pasted paper. I
customer_reviews.author: Weed Warrior

customer_reviews.title: Great for old houses
customer_reviews.text: Wallpaper is good quality and really helps hide uneven older walls. Application was easy even for a novice like me.
customer_reviews.author: jpg99ri

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Was easy to use and looks wonderful on my wall. I like that it is washable.
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: Great Paper
customer_reviews.text: Finally got to start my project. Put up a test piece yesterday. Paper is perfect thickness and sheen. You have to use wallpaper paste but much easier than I thought it would be. Put the paste on the wall then attached the paper - so easy. I am putting over wallpaper that is already there - so far so good. Hope to complete this week.
customer_reviews.author: C. Annotti

customer_reviews.title: CAUTION - Surface nicks easily.
customer_reviews.text: Vinyl coating does not add substantial protection from inadvertent bumps. Knowing this fault I have been very cautious but nicks have occurred anyway. I have had my artist son doing matching touch-up work whenever they occur. Do not use painters tape to protect paper when caulking or painting nearby. Painters tape will separate and remove the vinyl top layer, even when left on for minimal time. Recommendation: I changed to Frog Tape and did not have this issue. (If you don't have Frog tape, I experimented and found that pre-spraying with a clear sealer worked to prevent this, as well.)
customer_reviews.author: Mindy

customer_reviews.title: This is a very high quality beautiful paper. You will need to add adhesive
customer_reviews.text: This is a very high quality beautiful paper. You will need to add adhesive, but it hangs like a dream and is totally seamless when properly installed.
customer_reviews.author: T. Erb

customer_reviews.title: The BESTand easiest wallpaper  \I have ever hung!
customer_reviews.text: Without a doubt the best and easiest wallpaper I have ever hung. Plus with no pattern repeat, there is no waste!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful paper
customer_reviews.text: Used for accent wall in dining room. Beautiful paper with an updated look. I brushed on wallpaper paste and hung it - easy to put up. It’s been up for 1 month and have had no problems with areas coming loose.
customer_reviews.author: S MacK

customer_reviews.title: Nice texture
customer_reviews.text: Nice texture. No pattern to match. Blends very nice. Installed over existing vinyl paper in an RV. I don’t think this will be very durable. I tried to clean a smudge spot with light rubbing and the Finish came off.
customer_reviews.author: Mpg

customer_reviews.title: LUV!
customer_reviews.text: This Wallpaper is easy to work with & looks Fabulous! ♥️ Totally Recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Mary L

customer_reviews.title: Will purchase again for master bath!
customer_reviews.text: Really good quality paper hung it in a powder room surprised my wife with it.Covered the walls when she was out of town.
customer_reviews.author: Ronnie Ramsey

customer_reviews.title: ... be like-descriptions and colors are not necessarily great-turned out better than expected-on my walls now
customer_reviews.text: wasn't too sure what it would be like-descriptions and colors are not necessarily great-turned out better than expected-on my walls now!!!
customer_reviews.author: janet johnson

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the way it looks! Just easier to puncture when hanging than I thought. Great product
customer_reviews.author: Joan H.

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Gorgeous
customer_reviews.text: Looks great on the wall. Heavy material....very durable. Easy to put up. I love the look in my dining room. Looks very expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Jersey LindaTop Contributor: Health & Wellness

customer_reviews.title: Not very easy to hang
customer_reviews.text: It was not prepasted so it needed to be pasted. Because of its texture, it needed a generous amount of glue. It looks great installed, but it marred easily when I was hanging paintings on it. It does make a great backdrop for art work.
customer_reviews.author: Allen42

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful texture and color.
customer_reviews.text: I have put black and green in with this paper, but you could almost put any color scheme with it. Love the texture. Never wallpapered before, but a friend helped and it really wasn't that hard. Would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Ron/Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty
customer_reviews.text: This wall paper was easy to hang no pattern to match. I bought heavy duty adhesive to adhere to the wall as my paper was not pre pasted. Love the look of this paper. This paper is heavy weight, easy to hang and I had no problems with tearing
customer_reviews.author: Vicky

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Textured material in excellent price
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality and super stylish material , also excellent price , I really recommend it to buyers, I was looking every where and I bought A different Wallpaper from British but I returned it back because was not in excellent textured as this product , we are all love it at home and it makes a big difference .
customer_reviews.author: nevien

customer_reviews.title: Went up really easy. Great installation with no waste
customer_reviews.text: Went up really easy. Great installation with no waste. You could pull it off and on if wasn't lined up correctly!
customer_reviews.author: Chris Fegert

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install and looks great
customer_reviews.text: I have never hung wallpaper before and this paper was a breeze. The wallpaper is very forgiving and hides imperfections in the wall. You don't have to be a pro to hang this. Perfect for an amateur.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Delighted
customer_reviews.text: I scraped old paper off the kitchen wall and the surface underneath was a mess. This textured paper did an excellent job of covering everything up. The vertical pattern means no lost paper.
customer_reviews.author: Henry Neil

customer_reviews.title: I love this!
customer_reviews.text: Goes up easily. It's nice and heavy and looks fantastic. A timeless addition to any decor!
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Hangs easily without having to match a pattern
customer_reviews.text: Paper covered minor imperfections in the wall, no pattern to match so no waste. The paper is thicker and very easy to work with.
customer_reviews.author: Janice S.

customer_reviews.title: No toughness.
customer_reviews.text: The product is really nice looking. BUT Do Not use painters tape on it. The finish pulls off. Product is not durable!!! Finish comes off to easily with any slight bump. I am very disappointed with this aspect of the product.
customer_reviews.author: Tom B.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice looking, nice texture, some what tricky to work with.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Schoonveld

customer_reviews.title: Make something old look new.
customer_reviews.text: Really like the look and it was quick just measure cut glue and hang.
customer_reviews.author: Snake Oil

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful! Easy to Use!
customer_reviews.text: Really made my room feel more chic & expensive, and easy to attach with staple gun (staples blend in pretty well).
customer_reviews.author: Amazilla Pro

customer_reviews.title: best paper ever
customer_reviews.text: just remember after the paste is on the wallpaper it rips very easy but other than that its great. looks very nice up too
customer_reviews.author: linda m.

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality, use good adhesive.
customer_reviews.text: very nice, i used the "Rust-Oleum 69384 1-Quart SureGrip 122 Heavy Duty Clear Strippable Wallpaper Adhesive" it was very easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, but be careful-tears easily!
customer_reviews.text: Looks great, not having to match a pattern was a delight, the paper tears more easily than other wallpapers used.
customer_reviews.author: T. Granillo

customer_reviews.title: I love this textured wallpaper!!!
customer_reviews.text: This wallpaper is beautiful. The texture is very nice. I love it. It adds a certain warmth to my bedroom, surprisingly my husband liked it too!
customer_reviews.author: Wyvetta McLemore

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: love the paper but Not a double roll in amount of coverage.
customer_reviews.author: brenda ober

customer_reviews.title: Love the paper but it is really difficult to hang
customer_reviews.text: Love the paper but it is really difficult to hang. I had trouble with the seams (it is nice that there is no matching), and it is really heavy. I ended up not using it and just painting the wall I had planned for it and will use is for another project some time.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Clayton

product_meta.title: Forest Forest Tan Embossed Textured Wallpaper for Walls - Double Roll - by Romosa Wallcoverings
feature_bullets: Elegant and modern; brings warmth to any rooms; heavy textured
Paper Backed Vinyl. Extra washable. Peelable. Paste required; apply to wallpaper
Free design match; No pattern repeat
This is for 1 double roll; measures 20.8 Inch by 32.8 Feet; covers a total 56.8 square feet

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars88 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
